thread.section_title: Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location and staff, small rooms
thread.title_full: Great location and staff, small rooms - Review of Hotel Xenia Autograph Collection, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Django12
title: Great location and staff, small rooms
text: The location in South Kensington is great for quick access to everything in central London. Rooms as noted by many are small. I was joking that I had to leave the room to open my suitcase. We got a great rate in March and an upgrade because it's a Marriott property. Quick walk to a couple of underground stops. About a 20 minute walk to Harrod's or Hyde Park. I will stay here again!
